Class BTCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  bluetooth.BTCommunicator

public class BTCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object

A class to handle communication between the robot and the computer

Author:
raymondma

Constructor Summary
BTCommunicator()
          Creates a BTCommunicator object and connects it to the computer, then sets up the data streams and such.

send

public void send(int header,
                 int x,
                 int y)
          throws java.io.IOException
Sends a message to the computer specified by header, x, and y

Parameters:
header - 0 if location info, 1 if obstacle info
x - the x coordinate of the information
y - the y coordinate of the information
Throws:
java.io.IOException
